item.title: Apeiron Capital Investment Corp S-1
item.description: Apeiron Capital Investment Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on June 24, 2021 had 67348 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
